enchant_icon.config.background_type.tool: Type of background texture to use.
enchant_icon.config.level_mark_type.tool: Type of level mark texture to use.
enchant_icon.config.scope_for_gui_like.t: Scope in which this mod should display enchantment icons, when in a GUI-like scenario, for example inventory or item frame.
Scope in which this mod should display enchantment icons, when the item is hand-held by someone.
